data.description:
Fight the mad artificial intelligence and save mankind from becoming slaves of robots! Put on your VR glasses, became a Galactic Ranger, and get into deep space. Destroy countless waves of robots with badass blasters, mighty shotguns, and other crazy weapons like in the old good arcade cabinets!
Plot


Troublous signals come from the borders of explored space. Rebel robots have managed to teach themselves to cooperate and started to build bases on different uninhabited planets. Their new goal is to turn all of the bags with bones, also known as humans, into slaves of Robocracy.
Galactic Rangers have to deal with new problems!


Galactic Rangers have already proved that people may lay the defense from robots on them. But the new challenges are way more difficult because you’ll have to fight improved models!


Find and stop Robocracy until it’s too late! Defend simple values of the human civilization such as pretty kittens, breakfast in bed, funny memes, and arguing over the internet!


**Key features:**
- Survive three hardcore acts with lots of missions in the beautiful landscapes of the explored Universe
- Badass blasters, shotguns, and rocket launchers
- New control abilities take the game experience to a new level
- Different levels of difficulty. Protect yourself with shields, slow down the time, blow mines — use all of the possibilities to take control over the Universe back
- Do all you can to stop the Robocracy by yourself or fight the soulless machines with the help of your friends
